name: B33 - Medic Scavanger
description:
B 33  Medic Scavanger

In the far future, medical supplies are rare and so a new job emerged: Medical Scavangers. Captain Lyani and her Bot B33  simply called BEE are one of those. They got a Mission from the Inter Space Clinic to get a left behind Sample in a Research Lab.  Since the Enviroment is harsh only BEE can enter, but Lyani standing by him via many Comlink interactions. 

What did they do in this Lab?  Is BEE save? - Find Out and Play B33 Medic Scavanger to find it out for your self!

--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//

This Game was made for the "MyFirstGameJam" 2022 Summer edition.

its my 4. GameJam I ever joined and I challanged my self to make a Full Metroidvania with all the things I learned in the last year.

I used assets from Anzimus Goose Ninja and some CC0 stuff. Many assets where additionaly drawn by me.

The Bossfight took me 12 Hours of Coding refactoring and testing.  I know it doesn t look like that but it was very challanging to get the States running.

--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//--//

Please leave a comment when you Playes and give me some feedback.

I hope you have fun with my new Game. Thetra 00
